org.corfudb.runtime.view

Interface IStreamAddressSpace

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StreamAddressSpace

    public interface IStreamAddressSpace
    A stream address space is a write-once address space which is fully stream-aware. Entries in a stream address space contain: 1) A set of streams which the entry belongs to 2) A set of hints present when the entry was retrieved 3) The payload, as a byte buffer. Created by mwei on 8/26/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressSpaceEntry<T>
      This class represents an entry in a stream address space.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressSpaceEntry read(long offset)
      Read from the stream address space.
      void write(long offset, Set<UUID> streams, ByteBuffer payload)

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(long offset,
           Set<UUID> streams,
           ByteBuffer payload)
    throws OverwriteException,
           TrimmedException,
           OutOfSpaceException
        Write to the stream address space.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (global index) to write to.
        streams - The streams that this entry will belong to.
        payload - The payload that belongs to this entry.
        Throws:
        OverwriteException - If the index has been already written to.
        TrimmedException - If the index has been previously written to and is now released for garbage collection.
        OutOfSpaceException - If there is no space remaining in the current view of the address space.

      • writeObject

        default void writeObject(long offset,
                         Set<UUID> streams,
                         Serializable object)
                  throws OverwriteException,
                         TrimmedException,
                         OutOfSpaceException,
                         IOException
        Throws:
        OverwriteException
        TrimmedException
        OutOfSpaceException
        IOException

      • read

        IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressSpaceEntry read(long offset)
                                          throws TrimmedException
        Read from the stream address space.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (global index) to read from.
        Returns:
        A StreamAddressSpaceEntry which represents this entry, or null, if there is no entry at this space.
        Throws:
        TrimmedException - If the index has been previously written to and is now released for garbage collection.
